snippet: Jahlil Okafor, ranked the top high school junior by MaxPreps, has his eyes locked on the N.B.A. but handles the peripherals with as much aplomb as he handles double teams.
abstract: Profile of Jahlil Okafor, Whitney Young High School basketball player who averages about 21 points and 9 rebounds a game; Okafor is ranked top high school junior by MaxPreps and has sights set on NBA.
lead_paragraph: Jahlil Okafor, ranked the top high school junior by MaxPreps, has his eyes locked on the N.B.A. but handles the peripherals with as much aplomb as he handles double teams.

headline.seo: Jahlil Okafor, High School Hoops Star, Is Playing Way Above the Rim
headline.main: 17-Year-Old Takes All the Attention in Stride
headline.print_headline: Stars Big and Small: 17-Year-Old Takes All the Attention in Stride
